review_data.title: Have your coffee with banana bread
review_data.content: As the name suggests, it is all about coffee in this tiny cafe and shop but you are in for a real treat if you pair it with a slice of their banana bread. Non too sweet perfection perfectly complementing the coffee, kudos all the...More

review_data.title: Nie wieder!
review_data.content: Unfreundlich, arrogant. Nie wieder! Vorallem schlechte Bedienung. Nicht empfehlenswert. Viel zu klein kommt dazu.

review_data.title: A must for coffee lovers
review_data.content: I seek out coffee places from around the world and this is gem. The coffee was so heavy and lucious, works very nicely with milk, but also without. Service was friendly and the cafe is little so best for a catch up with 1 to...More

review_data.title: Da gibt’s halt Kaffee
review_data.content: Stets auf der Suche nach neuen Cafés und gutem Kaffee besuchte ich heute Mittag das in vielen Führern erwähnte und...More

review_data.title: Das Qualitätsversprechen
review_data.content: Wer Qualität statt Quantität zu schätzen weiß, wem es beim Kaffee mehr um Geschmack denn 'Lifestyle' geht, der wird in...More

review_data.title: Passionate about great coffee on a global scale, you have arrived.
review_data.content: I read about "COFFEE" IN Zurich. So this morning I decided to track them down. It was well worth it, this is coffee on another level. Thank you so much and got the home brewing tips.☕☕☕☕☕

review_data.title: Best Capuccino in Zurich
review_data.content: Mini coffee shop but very charming. The green marble counter is already worth the visit. The coffee itself is definitely the best in Zurich.

review_data.title: Coffee im Aroma&Duft
review_data.content: Der aromatischste Coffee in der Kaffee-Stadt Zürich. Akurate Zubereitung in jeder Tasse Kaffee mit charmantem Ambiente und Bedienung.

review_data.title: Amazing Filter coffee - super nice staff
review_data.content: In search (and need) for a good coffee I discovered "COFFEE". As a coffee enthusiast myself I always try to visit specialty coffee places wherever I go. The staff was super nice and defintitely knows their ways around good coffee. They serve Stoll coffee beans...More

review_data.title: Für Kaffeeliebhaber
review_data.content: Wer Kaffee mag oder sich in die Kaffeekunst einführen lassen möchte, ist hier ganz richtig. Der beste Kaffee, ob aus...More

review_data.title: It’s a small, but professionally run coffee shop
review_data.content: COFFEE is located near the Wiedikon-Werd neighborhood. This small no-frills coffee spot has about four sidewalk tables, six tables inside along with a couple of bar stools. They serve mostly coffee, but fortunate for me they also serve hot chocolate (4.40CHF) and use oat milk...More
